About

MergeSoft is a 'virtual' software development company that specializes in the development of Kurdish web and mobile applications.

Our projects 'Gotinên Stranan' and 'Asoya Helbesta Kurdî' are the largest collections of Kurdish lyrics and poems.

The company also develops open-source libraries and tools for Android (Java), Flutter, Laravel and Visual Studio Code.

To follow our projects, please visit our GitHub page.
